/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -fPIC -O3 -Wall -fno-aggressive-loop-optimizations -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections   CMakeFiles/img_show.dir/img_show.cpp.o  -o ../../../examples/img_show/img_show  -L/home/june/ssd/github/opencv/install/usr/local/lib -rdynamic -lopencv_core -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgcodecs -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_videoio -lopencv_features2d -Wl,-rpath,/home/june/ssd/github/opencv/install/usr/local/lib
